body_html:
Sorry for the late reply. It seems to be a bug in CUDA according to the link to CUDA form. Currently I don't plan to reinstall the system for this(it's quite messy) and I am ok with running Pytorch on CPU for now.
You can close the issue if the officially supported platforms don't have this bug.
:) Thanks.

body:
Sorry for the late reply. It seems to be a bug in CUDA according to the link to CUDA form. Currently I don't plan to reinstall the system for this(it's quite messy) and I am ok with running Pytorch on CPU for now. 
You can close the issue if the officially supported platforms don't have this bug. 
:) Thanks.
